msg: o Use maven-javadoc-plugin 2.4, to avoid MJAVADOC-161.

author: jalkanen
msg: JSPWIKI-234: Added ISO8601 formats to the default format list.

author: jalkanen
msg: [JSPWIKI-183] PageRenamer no longer chokes if attachments are turned off.  Reported by Luca Gilardoni.

author: wsmoak
msg: [CONTINUUM-1515] For release preparation, default the scm tag to $artifactId-$version, minus the -SNAPSHOT suffix if present.
(If the project has configured the release plugin with a tag name, that will be used instead.)
